entry: This was the last time I have to ask a filthy mortal for help!
And now I'm going to devour the world.
What do you want to do, stop me? You got nothing on me! You're a human! I'm literally fire!
[not $hasFriendship]As a cherry on top of the fiery cake, I'm also gonna consume all of your power-ups. @noFriendship
As a cherry on top of the fiery cake, I'm also gonna consume all of your power-ups. @friendship
noFriendship: All of the useful ones, that is. You can keep that annoying dancing Dave as eternal punishment!
friendship: Didn't you have a flying power-up before? Where did that go?
I was really looking forward to consume it. It tastes like chicken…
